text: Edward Kocząb (2 August 1928 — 17 September 2002), was a Polish ice hockey player. He played for Legia Warsaw and KTH Krynica during his career. He also played for the Polish national team at the 1956 Winter Olympics and several World Championships. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1928 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Ice hockey players at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:KTH Krynica players Category:Legia Warsaw (ice hockey) players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Poland Category:People from Krynica- Zdrój Category:Sportspeople from Lesser Poland Voivodeship Category:Polish ice hockey goaltenders
title: Edward Kocząb
